help.presentation: <a:pin:893553168259121172> Hello, I am Node an all-in-one, multifunctional bot with innovative commands.
help.how_use: How do I see the commands?
help.how_use_answer: Easy, you just have to write
help.need_support: If I need support, how can I contact with the support team
help.need_support_answer: You can ask in our [support server!]({inviteURL})
help.how_vote: How can I vote for the bot?
help.how_vote_answer: u can do it using the command <a:arrowright:970388686816550912> `/vote` or [Clicking Here](https://vote.nodebot.xyz) 'We are waiting your vote :)'

messages.0: There are no songs playing on your voice channel. Why don't you add one? <:pepeblink:967941236029788160>
messages.1: It sounds like you're not listening to music, how about we do it? <:pepeblink:967941236029788160>
messages.2: What are you doing that you don't listen to music? Add a song now :)
